newsitem.title: UK: DepFa Bank sets 1.0 bln mark 12-year bond.
newsitem.headline: DepFa Bank sets 1.0 bln mark 12-year bond.

text.p: The following bond was announced by joint lead managers Commerzbank, CSFB and Goldman Sachs.
BORROWER DEUTSCHE PFANDBRIEF- UND HYPOTHEKENBANK AG
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE ** PAY DATE 04.MAR.97
DENOMS (K) 1 LISTING FFT PAY FREQ ANNUAL
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
GOV LAW GERMAN HOME CTRY GERMANY TAX PROVS STD
